body.name: Krib Bling 17.7 lbs Full-Automatic Washing Machine with LED Display, Portable Compact Laundry Washer with Drain Pump, 10 Wash Programs 8 Water Levels, Grey
body.stockDetail: Only 15 left in stock - order soon.
features: 【Multi-functional Control Panel】There’ re 10 washing programs, 4 water level mode and 8 water level selections on the control panel of the full automatic washing machine, which is convenient. LED display could clearly show the laundry time. And the child lock also ensure the normal operation of the washing machine while protecting the safety of your family.

【Large Capacity for Family】The inner tub of this portable washer could load 15.6 lbs of clothes at one time, which is suitable for family of 3-4 members. The reference weight for all types of clothes would also be highlighted in the description and pictures. This washing machine would help you save more energy and efforts.

【Portable and Space Saving】Our washing machine won’t take much space, thus making it an ideal choice for households with limit space, such as RV, Camping, Dorm and Apartments. You could easily store it. And you also don’t need to assemble this washer much before usage, hassle-free and easy to operate.

【Automatic Imbalance Adjustment】Other portable washer would be violent shaking and vibrating while washing or spinning. But our laundry washing machine would initiate its imbalance adjustment system to handle this kind of situation, thus ensure the safety and reduce noise.

【Full Automatic Washer】 This portable washing machine is designed as a 2 in 1 compact washer. All you need to do is selecting the washing & spinning program and water level, then the mini laundry washer could work alone without your constant attention. This could save your time and you could do something more important.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The washing machine I received has internal damage. What should I do? Our mailbox is on the outer package. You can tell me about the washing machine and send us photos. We usually process mail and in-mail messages within 24 hours. The protection bracket in the washing machine is damaged. What should I do? The protection bracket in the washing machine does not affect the use of the washing machine. You can tear it down. Its function is to protect the internal parts of the washing machine during transportation. I chose to AA soak, but the washing machine didn't work. What should I do? If immersion is selected, the washing machine will not start working properly until the clothes have been soaked for 15 minutes. Can the washing machine wash clothes in hot water? The washing machine can wash clothes in hot water. But pay attention to the fabric. Some materials will deform and fade if washed in hot water, which will also reduce the effect of laundry detergent. There is abnormal noise in the washing machine. How should I handle it? Please note: If the clothes are not evenly placed, the inner clothes cannot be dried during the drying process and there will be abnormal sound of clothes hitting the washing machine barrel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As what I expected
reviews.reviewText: The wash machine is not big and good for my area. It is for my baby’s clothes so it is very enough.it has different styles and easy to use. Very good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Stopped spinning after a month
reviews.reviewText: I've only had this machine just a little under a month and while using it made a loud noise then stopped spinning I look underneath and one of the wires are messed up. Can't even return because it says return window is closed 😕

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The machine is great! We bought it for my dog's towels, small rugs and shoes. It is small for kitchen carpet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for apartment and baby
reviews.reviewText: It’s great for apartments, where we don’t have much space for larger wash machine. And it won’t make too much of louder sounds

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Washer well, but tub to small.
reviews.reviewText: This machine washes well, but the inner tub is too small and can only wash a few items of clothing at a time. The water pipes were short, flimsy and did not fit snugly. The drain hose should be longer. This is a great little washing machine that can be used when needed, but not for everyday use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a very easy-to-use washing machine
reviews.reviewText: The quality of this washing machine is really very good. It is really good after several times of use before writing real and effective comments. The seller also sends goods quickly. Because my family employees use the washing machine with us, I don't want the big washing machine at home to wash my baby's clothes, so I bought this washing machine to wash my baby's clothes independently. Facts have proved that, My shopping is very correct. It is clean and hygienic. I don't worry about the baby mixing other bacteria anymore. The quality is very good, easy to install, low noise, clean laundry and good drying effect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good load amounts
reviews.reviewText: I don’t have a washing machine In my apartment and I saw that this was on sale so I purchased it, it can hold a lot of my laundry but the thing that I don’t really like is the draining pipe because it very wiggly so you would have to stand by to push out the water . Otherwise everything else is perfectly fine

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It's very small！
reviews.reviewText: The washing tub is tiny. For the size of the machine from the outside you think, okay this isn't too bad. But when you open the lid and see the tiny tub engulfed in all that plastic...
